3299inline auto movegen::init_squares_between() {
3300 std::array<std::array<Bitboard, 64>, 64> squares_between_bb{};
3301 Bitboard sqs = 0;
3302
3303 for (Square sq1 = 0; sq1 < 64; ++sq1) {
3304 for (Square sq2 = 0; sq2 < 64; ++sq2) {
3305 sqs = Bitboard::fromSquare(sq1) | Bitboard::fromSquare(sq2);
3306 if (sq1 == sq2)
3307 squares_between_bb[sq1.index()][sq2.index()].clear();
3308 else if (sq1.file() == sq2.file() || sq1.rank() == sq2.rank())
3309 squares_between_bb[sq1.index()][sq2.index()] = attacks::rook(sq1, sqs) & attacks::rook(sq2, sqs);
3310 else if (sq1.diagonal_of() == sq2.diagonal_of() || sq1.antidiagonal_of() == sq2.antidiagonal_of())
3311 squares_between_bb[sq1.index()][sq2.index()] = attacks::bishop(sq1, sqs) & attacks::bishop(sq2, sqs);
3312 }
3313 }
3314
3315 return squares_between_bb;
3316}
3317
3318template <Color::underlying c>
3319[[nodiscard]] inline std::pair<Bitboard, int> movegen::checkMask(const Board &board, Square sq) {
3320 const auto opp_knight = board.pieces(PieceType::KNIGHT, ~c);
3321 const auto opp_bishop = board.pieces(PieceType::BISHOP, ~c);
3322 const auto opp_rook = board.pieces(PieceType::ROOK, ~c);
3323 const auto opp_queen = board.pieces(PieceType::QUEEN, ~c);
3324
3325 const auto opp_pawns = board.pieces(PieceType::PAWN, ~c);
3326
3327 int checks = 0;
3328
3329 // check for knight checks
3330 Bitboard knight_attacks = attacks::knight(sq) & opp_knight;
3331 checks += bool(knight_attacks);
3332
3333 Bitboard mask = knight_attacks;
3334
3335 // check for pawn checks
3336 Bitboard pawn_attacks = attacks::pawn(board.sideToMove(), sq) & opp_pawns;
3337 mask |= pawn_attacks;
3338 checks += bool(pawn_attacks);
3339
3340 // check for bishop checks
3341 Bitboard bishop_attacks = attacks::bishop(sq, board.occ()) & (opp_bishop | opp_queen);
3342
3343 if (bishop_attacks) {
3344 const auto index = bishop_attacks.lsb();
3345
3346 mask |= SQUARES_BETWEEN_BB[sq.index()][index] | Bitboard::fromSquare(index);
3347 checks++;
3348 }
3349
3350 Bitboard rook_attacks = attacks::rook(sq, board.occ()) & (opp_rook | opp_queen);
3351
3352 if (rook_attacks) {
3353 if (rook_attacks.count() > 1) {
3354 checks = 2;
3355 return {mask, checks};
3356 }
3357
3358 const auto index = rook_attacks.lsb();
3359
3360 mask |= SQUARES_BETWEEN_BB[sq.index()][index] | Bitboard::fromSquare(index);
3361 checks++;
3362 }
3363
3364 if (!mask) {
3365 return {constants::DEFAULT_CHECKMASK, checks};
3366 }
3367
3368 return {mask, checks};
3369}
3370
3371template <Color::underlying c>
3372[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::pinMaskRooks(const Board &board, Square sq, Bitboard occ_opp, Bitboard occ_us) {
3373 const auto opp_rook = board.pieces(PieceType::ROOK, ~c);
3374 const auto opp_queen = board.pieces(PieceType::QUEEN, ~c);
3375
3376 Bitboard rook_attacks = attacks::rook(sq, occ_opp) & (opp_rook | opp_queen);
3377 Bitboard pin_hv = 0;
3378
3379 while (rook_attacks) {
3380 const auto index = rook_attacks.pop();
3381
3382 const Bitboard possible_pin = SQUARES_BETWEEN_BB[sq.index()][index] | Bitboard::fromSquare(index);
3383 if ((possible_pin & occ_us).count() == 1) pin_hv |= possible_pin;
3384 }
3385
3386 return pin_hv;
3387}
3388
3389template <Color::underlying c>
3390[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::pinMaskBishops(const Board &board, Square sq, Bitboard occ_opp,
3391 Bitboard occ_us) {
3392 const auto opp_bishop = board.pieces(PieceType::BISHOP, ~c);
3393 const auto opp_queen = board.pieces(PieceType::QUEEN, ~c);
3394
3395 Bitboard bishop_attacks = attacks::bishop(sq, occ_opp) & (opp_bishop | opp_queen);
3396 Bitboard pin_diag = 0;
3397
3398 while (bishop_attacks) {
3399 const auto index = bishop_attacks.pop();
3400
3401 const Bitboard possible_pin = SQUARES_BETWEEN_BB[sq.index()][index] | Bitboard::fromSquare(index);
3402 if ((possible_pin & occ_us).count() == 1) pin_diag |= possible_pin;
3403 }
3404
3405 return pin_diag;
3406}
3407
3408template <Color::underlying c>
3409[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::seenSquares(const Board &board, Bitboard enemy_empty) {
3410 auto king_sq = board.kingSq(~c);
3411 Bitboard map_king_atk = attacks::king(king_sq) & enemy_empty;
3412
3413 if (map_king_atk == Bitboard(0ull) && !board.chess960()) {
3414 return 0ull;
3415 }
3416
3417 auto occ = board.occ() & ~Bitboard::fromSquare(king_sq);
3418 auto queens = board.pieces(PieceType::QUEEN, c);
3419 auto pawns = board.pieces(PieceType::PAWN, c);
3420 auto knights = board.pieces(PieceType::KNIGHT, c);
3421 auto bishops = board.pieces(PieceType::BISHOP, c) | queens;
3422 auto rooks = board.pieces(PieceType::ROOK, c) | queens;
3423
3424 Bitboard seen = attacks::pawnLeftAttacks<c>(pawns) | attacks::pawnRightAttacks<c>(pawns);
3425
3426 while (knights) {
3427 const auto index = knights.pop();
3428 seen |= attacks::knight(index);
3429 }
3430
3431 while (bishops) {
3432 const auto index = bishops.pop();
3433 seen |= attacks::bishop(index, occ);
3434 }
3435
3436 while (rooks) {
3437 const auto index = rooks.pop();
3438 seen |= attacks::rook(index, occ);
3439 }
3440
3441 const Square index = board.kingSq(c);
3442 seen |= attacks::king(index);
3443
3444 return seen;
3445}
3446
3447template <Color::underlying c, movegen::MoveGenType mt>
3448inline void movegen::generatePawnMoves(const Board &board, Movelist &moves, Bitboard pin_d, Bitboard pin_hv,
3449 Bitboard checkmask, Bitboard occ_opp) {
3450 // flipped for black
3451
3452 constexpr auto UP = make_direction(Direction::NORTH, c);
3453 constexpr auto DOWN = make_direction(Direction::SOUTH, c);
3454 constexpr auto DOWN_LEFT = make_direction(Direction::SOUTH_WEST, c);
3455 constexpr auto DOWN_RIGHT = make_direction(Direction::SOUTH_EAST, c);
3456 constexpr auto UP_LEFT = make_direction(Direction::NORTH_WEST, c);
3457 constexpr auto UP_RIGHT = make_direction(Direction::NORTH_EAST, c);
3458
3459 constexpr auto RANK_B_PROMO = Rank::rank(Rank::RANK_7, c).bb();
3460 constexpr auto RANK_PROMO = Rank::rank(Rank::RANK_8, c).bb();
3461 constexpr auto DOUBLE_PUSH_RANK = Rank::rank(Rank::RANK_3, c).bb();
3462
3463 const auto pawns = board.pieces(PieceType::PAWN, c);
3464
3465 // These pawns can maybe take Left or Right
3466 const Bitboard pawns_lr = pawns & ~pin_hv;
3467 const Bitboard unpinned_pawns_lr = pawns_lr & ~pin_d;
3468 const Bitboard pinned_pawns_lr = pawns_lr & pin_d;
3469
3470 auto l_pawns = attacks::shift<UP_LEFT>(unpinned_pawns_lr) | (attacks::shift<UP_LEFT>(pinned_pawns_lr) & pin_d);
3471 auto r_pawns = attacks::shift<UP_RIGHT>(unpinned_pawns_lr) | (attacks::shift<UP_RIGHT>(pinned_pawns_lr) & pin_d);
3472
3473 // Prune moves that don't capture a piece and are not on the checkmask.
3474 l_pawns &= occ_opp & checkmask;
3475 r_pawns &= occ_opp & checkmask;
3476
3477 // These pawns can walk Forward
3478 const auto pawns_hv = pawns & ~pin_d;
3479
3480 const auto pawns_pinned_hv = pawns_hv & pin_hv;
3481 const auto pawns_unpinned_hv = pawns_hv & ~pin_hv;
3482
3483 // Prune moves that are blocked by a piece
3484 const auto single_push_unpinned = attacks::shift<UP>(pawns_unpinned_hv) & ~board.occ();
3485 const auto single_push_pinned = attacks::shift<UP>(pawns_pinned_hv) & pin_hv & ~board.occ();
3486
3487 // Prune moves that are not on the checkmask.
3488 Bitboard single_push = (single_push_unpinned | single_push_pinned) & checkmask;
3489
3490 Bitboard double_push = ((attacks::shift<UP>(single_push_unpinned & DOUBLE_PUSH_RANK) & ~board.occ()) |
3491 (attacks::shift<UP>(single_push_pinned & DOUBLE_PUSH_RANK) & ~board.occ())) &
3492 checkmask;
3493
3494 if (pawns & RANK_B_PROMO) {
3495 Bitboard promo_left = l_pawns & RANK_PROMO;
3496 Bitboard promo_right = r_pawns & RANK_PROMO;
3497 Bitboard promo_push = single_push & RANK_PROMO;
3498
3499 // Skip capturing promotions if we are only generating quiet moves.
3500 // Generates at ALL and CAPTURE
3501 while (mt != MoveGenType::QUIET && promo_left) {
3502 const auto index = promo_left.pop();
3503 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_RIGHT, index, PieceType::QUEEN));
3504 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_RIGHT, index, PieceType::ROOK));
3505 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_RIGHT, index, PieceType::BISHOP));
3506 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_RIGHT, index, PieceType::KNIGHT));
3507 }
3508
3509 // Skip capturing promotions if we are only generating quiet moves.
3510 // Generates at ALL and CAPTURE
3511 while (mt != MoveGenType::QUIET && promo_right) {
3512 const auto index = promo_right.pop();
3513 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_LEFT, index, PieceType::QUEEN));
3514 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_LEFT, index, PieceType::ROOK));
3515 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_LEFT, index, PieceType::BISHOP));
3516 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN_LEFT, index, PieceType::KNIGHT));
3517 }
3518
3519 // Skip quiet promotions if we are only generating captures.
3520 // Generates at ALL and QUIET
3521 while (mt != MoveGenType::CAPTURE && promo_push) {
3522 const auto index = promo_push.pop();
3523 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN, index, PieceType::QUEEN));
3524 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN, index, PieceType::ROOK));
3525 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN, index, PieceType::BISHOP));
3526 moves.add(Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(index + DOWN, index, PieceType::KNIGHT));
3527 }
3528 }
3529
3530 single_push &= ~RANK_PROMO;
3531 l_pawns &= ~RANK_PROMO;
3532 r_pawns &= ~RANK_PROMO;
3533
3534 while (mt != MoveGenType::QUIET && l_pawns) {
3535 const auto index = l_pawns.pop();
3536 moves.add(Move::make<Move::NORMAL>(index + DOWN_RIGHT, index));
3537 }
3538
3539 while (mt != MoveGenType::QUIET && r_pawns) {
3540 const auto index = r_pawns.pop();
3541 moves.add(Move::make<Move::NORMAL>(index + DOWN_LEFT, index));
3542 }
3543
3544 while (mt != MoveGenType::CAPTURE && single_push) {
3545 const auto index = single_push.pop();
3546 moves.add(Move::make<Move::NORMAL>(index + DOWN, index));
3547 }
3548
3549 while (mt != MoveGenType::CAPTURE && double_push) {
3550 const auto index = double_push.pop();
3551 moves.add(Move::make<Move::NORMAL>(index + DOWN + DOWN, index));
3552 }
3553
3554 if constexpr (mt == MoveGenType::QUIET) return;
3555
3556 const Square ep = board.enpassantSq();
3557
3558 if (ep != Square::underlying::NO_SQ) {
3559 auto m = generateEPMove(board, checkmask, pin_d, pawns_lr, ep, c);
3560
3561 for (const auto &move : m) {
3562 if (move != Move::NO_MOVE) moves.add(move);
3563 }
3564 }
3565}
3566
3567[[nodiscard]] inline std::array<Move, 2> movegen::generateEPMove(const Board &board, Bitboard checkmask, Bitboard pin_d,
3568 Bitboard pawns_lr, Square ep, Color c) {
3569 assert((ep.rank() == Rank::RANK_3 && board.sideToMove() == Color::BLACK) ||
3570 (ep.rank() == Rank::RANK_6 && board.sideToMove() == Color::WHITE));
3571
3572 std::array<Move, 2> moves = {Move::NO_MOVE, Move::NO_MOVE};
3573 auto i = 0;
3574
3575 const auto DOWN = make_direction(Direction::SOUTH, c);
3576 const auto epPawnSq = ep + DOWN;
3577
3578 /*
3579 In case the en passant square and the enemy pawn
3580 that just moved are not on the checkmask
3581 en passant is not available.
3582 */
3583 if ((checkmask & (Bitboard::fromSquare(epPawnSq) | Bitboard::fromSquare(ep))) == Bitboard(0)) return moves;
3584
3585 const Square kSQ = board.kingSq(c);
3586 const Bitboard kingMask = Bitboard::fromSquare(kSQ) & epPawnSq.rank().bb();
3587 const Bitboard enemyQueenRook = board.pieces(PieceType::ROOK, ~c) | board.pieces(PieceType::QUEEN, ~c);
3588
3589 auto epBB = attacks::pawn(~c, ep) & pawns_lr;
3590
3591 // For one en passant square two pawns could potentially take there.
3592 while (epBB) {
3593 const auto from = epBB.pop();
3594 const auto to = ep;
3595
3596 /*
3597 If the pawn is pinned but the en passant square is not on the
3598 pin mask then the move is illegal.
3599 */
3600 if ((Bitboard::fromSquare(from) & pin_d) && !(pin_d & Bitboard::fromSquare(ep))) continue;
3601
3602 const auto connectingPawns = Bitboard::fromSquare(epPawnSq) | Bitboard::fromSquare(from);
3603
3604 /*
3605 7k/4p3/8/2KP3r/8/8/8/8 b - - 0 1
3606 If e7e5 there will be a potential ep square for us on e6.
3607 However, we cannot take en passant because that would put our king
3608 in check. For this scenario we check if there's an enemy rook/queen
3609 that would give check if the two pawns were removed.
3610 If that's the case then the move is illegal and we can break immediately.
3611 */
3612 const auto isPossiblePin = kingMask && enemyQueenRook;
3613
3614 if (isPossiblePin && (attacks::rook(kSQ, board.occ() & ~connectingPawns) & enemyQueenRook) != Bitboard(0))
3615 break;
3616
3617 moves[i++] = Move::make<Move::ENPASSANT>(from, to);
3618 }
3619
3620 return moves;
3621}
3622
3623[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::generateKnightMoves(Square sq) { return attacks::knight(sq); }
3624
3625[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::generateBishopMoves(Square sq, Bitboard pin_d, Bitboard occ_all) {
3626 // The Bishop is pinned diagonally thus can only move diagonally.
3627 if (pin_d & Bitboard::fromSquare(sq)) return attacks::bishop(sq, occ_all) & pin_d;
3628 return attacks::bishop(sq, occ_all);
3629}
3630
3631[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::generateRookMoves(Square sq, Bitboard pin_hv, Bitboard occ_all) {
3632 // The Rook is pinned horizontally thus can only move horizontally.
3633 if (pin_hv & Bitboard::fromSquare(sq)) return attacks::rook(sq, occ_all) & pin_hv;
3634 return attacks::rook(sq, occ_all);
3635}
3636
3637[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::generateQueenMoves(Square sq, Bitboard pin_d, Bitboard pin_hv,
3638 Bitboard occ_all) {
3639 Bitboard moves = 0ULL;
3640
3641 if (pin_d & Bitboard::fromSquare(sq))
3642 moves |= attacks::bishop(sq, occ_all) & pin_d;
3643 else if (pin_hv & Bitboard::fromSquare(sq))
3644 moves |= attacks::rook(sq, occ_all) & pin_hv;
3645 else {
3646 moves |= attacks::rook(sq, occ_all);
3647 moves |= attacks::bishop(sq, occ_all);
3648 }
3649
3650 return moves;
3651}
3652
3653[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::generateKingMoves(Square sq, Bitboard seen, Bitboard movable_square) {
3654 return attacks::king(sq) & movable_square & ~seen;
3655}
3656
3657template <Color::underlying c, movegen::MoveGenType mt>
3658[[nodiscard]] inline Bitboard movegen::generateCastleMoves(const Board &board, Square sq, Bitboard seen,
3659 Bitboard pin_hv) {
3660 if constexpr (mt == MoveGenType::CAPTURE) return 0ull;
3661 if (!Square::back_rank(sq, c) || !board.castlingRights().has(c)) return 0ull;
3662
3663 const auto rights = board.castlingRights();
3664
3665 Bitboard moves = 0ull;
3666
3667 for (const auto side : {Board::CastlingRights::Side::KING_SIDE, Board::CastlingRights::Side::QUEEN_SIDE}) {
3668 if (!rights.has(c, side)) continue;
3669
3670 const auto end_king_sq = Square::castling_king_square(side == Board::CastlingRights::Side::KING_SIDE, c);
3671 const auto end_rook_sq = Square::castling_rook_square(side == Board::CastlingRights::Side::KING_SIDE, c);
3672
3673 const auto from_rook_sq = Square(rights.getRookFile(c, side), sq.rank());
3674
3675 const Bitboard not_occ_path = SQUARES_BETWEEN_BB[sq.index()][from_rook_sq.index()];
3676 const Bitboard not_attacked_path = SQUARES_BETWEEN_BB[sq.index()][end_king_sq.index()];
3677 const Bitboard empty_not_attacked = ~seen & ~(board.occ() & Bitboard(~Bitboard::fromSquare(from_rook_sq)));
3678 const Bitboard withoutRook = board.occ() & Bitboard(~Bitboard::fromSquare(from_rook_sq));
3679 const Bitboard withoutKing = board.occ() & Bitboard(~Bitboard::fromSquare(sq));
3680
3681 if ((not_attacked_path & empty_not_attacked) == not_attacked_path &&
3682 ((not_occ_path & ~board.occ()) == not_occ_path) &&
3683 !(Bitboard::fromSquare(from_rook_sq) & pin_hv.getBits() & sq.rank().bb()) &&
3684 !(Bitboard::fromSquare(end_rook_sq) & (withoutRook & withoutKing).getBits()) &&
3685 !(Bitboard::fromSquare(end_king_sq) &
3686 (seen | (withoutRook & Bitboard(~Bitboard::fromSquare(sq)))).getBits())) {
3687 moves |= Bitboard::fromSquare(from_rook_sq);
3688 }
3689 }
3690
3691 return moves;
3692}
3693
3694template <typename T>
3695inline void movegen::whileBitboardAdd(Movelist &movelist, Bitboard mask, T func) {
3696 while (mask) {
3697 const Square from = mask.pop();
3698 auto moves = func(from);
3699 while (moves) {
3700 const Square to = moves.pop();
3701 movelist.add(Move::make<Move::NORMAL>(from, to));
3702 }
3703 }
3704}
3705
3706template <Color::underlying c, movegen::MoveGenType mt>
3707inline void movegen::legalmoves(Movelist &movelist, const Board &board, int pieces) {
3708 /*
3709 The size of the movelist might not
3710 be 0! This is done on purpose since it enables
3711 you to append new move types to any movelist.
3712 */
3713 auto king_sq = board.kingSq(c);
3714
3715 Bitboard occ_us = board.us(c);
3716 Bitboard occ_opp = board.us(~c);
3717 Bitboard occ_all = occ_us | occ_opp;
3718
3719 Bitboard opp_empty = ~occ_us;
3720
3721 const auto [checkmask, checks] = checkMask<c>(board, king_sq);
3722 const auto pin_hv = pinMaskRooks<c>(board, king_sq, occ_opp, occ_us);
3723 const auto pin_d = pinMaskBishops<c>(board, king_sq, occ_opp, occ_us);
3724
3725 assert(checks <= 2);
3726
3727 // Moves have to be on the checkmask
3728 Bitboard movable_square;
3729
3730 // Slider, Knights and King moves can only go to enemy or empty squares.
3731 if (mt == MoveGenType::ALL)
3732 movable_square = opp_empty;
3733 else if (mt == MoveGenType::CAPTURE)
3734 movable_square = occ_opp;
3735 else // QUIET moves
3736 movable_square = ~occ_all;
3737
3738 if (pieces & PieceGenType::KING) {
3739 Bitboard seen = seenSquares<~c>(board, opp_empty);
3740
3741 whileBitboardAdd(movelist, Bitboard::fromSquare(king_sq),
3742 [&](Square sq) { return generateKingMoves(sq, seen, movable_square); });
3743
3744 if (checks == 0) {
3745 Bitboard moves_bb = generateCastleMoves<c, mt>(board, king_sq, seen, pin_hv);
3746
3747 while (moves_bb) {
3748 Square to = moves_bb.pop();
3749 movelist.add(Move::make<Move::CASTLING>(king_sq, to));
3750 }
3751 }
3752 }
3753
3754 movable_square &= checkmask;
3755
3756 // Early return for double check as described earlier
3757 if (checks == 2) return;
3758
3759 // Add the moves to the movelist.
3760 if (pieces & PieceGenType::PAWN) {
3761 generatePawnMoves<c, mt>(board, movelist, pin_d, pin_hv, checkmask, occ_opp);
3762 }
3763
3764 if (pieces & PieceGenType::KNIGHT) {
3765 // Prune knights that are pinned since these cannot move.
3766 Bitboard knights_mask = board.pieces(PieceType::KNIGHT, c) & ~(pin_d | pin_hv);
3767
3768 whileBitboardAdd(movelist, knights_mask, [&](Square sq) { return generateKnightMoves(sq) & movable_square; });
3769 }
3770
3771 if (pieces & PieceGenType::BISHOP) {
3772 // Prune horizontally pinned bishops
3773 Bitboard bishops_mask = board.pieces(PieceType::BISHOP, c) & ~pin_hv;
3774
3775 whileBitboardAdd(movelist, bishops_mask,
3776 [&](Square sq) { return generateBishopMoves(sq, pin_d, occ_all) & movable_square; });
3777 }
3778
3779 if (pieces & PieceGenType::ROOK) {
3780 // Prune diagonally pinned rooks
3781 Bitboard rooks_mask = board.pieces(PieceType::ROOK, c) & ~pin_d;
3782
3783 whileBitboardAdd(movelist, rooks_mask,
3784 [&](Square sq) { return generateRookMoves(sq, pin_hv, occ_all) & movable_square; });
3785 }
3786
3787 if (pieces & PieceGenType::QUEEN) {
3788 // Prune double pinned queens
3789 Bitboard queens_mask = board.pieces(PieceType::QUEEN, c) & ~(pin_d & pin_hv);
3790
3791 whileBitboardAdd(movelist, queens_mask,
3792 [&](Square sq) { return generateQueenMoves(sq, pin_d, pin_hv, occ_all) & movable_square; });
3793 }
3794}
3795
3796template <movegen::MoveGenType mt>
3797inline void movegen::legalmoves(Movelist &movelist, const Board &board, int pieces) {
3798 movelist.clear();
3799
3800 if (board.sideToMove() == Color::WHITE)
3801 legalmoves<Color::WHITE, mt>(movelist, board, pieces);
3802 else
3803 legalmoves<Color::BLACK, mt>(movelist, board, pieces);
3804}
3805
3806template <Color::underlying c>
3807inline bool movegen::isEpSquareValid(const Board &board, Square ep) {
3808 const auto stm = board.sideToMove();
3809
3810 Bitboard occ_us = board.us(stm);
3811 Bitboard occ_opp = board.us(~stm);
3812 auto king_sq = board.kingSq(stm);
3813
3814 const auto [checkmask, checks] = movegen::checkMask<c>(board, king_sq);
3815 const auto pin_hv = movegen::pinMaskRooks<c>(board, king_sq, occ_opp, occ_us);
3816 const auto pin_d = movegen::pinMaskBishops<c>(board, king_sq, occ_opp, occ_us);
3817
3818 const auto pawns = board.pieces(PieceType::PAWN, stm);
3819 const auto pawns_lr = pawns & ~pin_hv;
3820 const auto m = movegen::generateEPMove(board, checkmask, pin_d, pawns_lr, ep, stm);
3821 bool found = false;
3822
3823 for (const auto &move : m) {
3824 if (move != Move::NO_MOVE) {
3825 found = true;
3826 break;
3827 }
3828 }
3829
3830 return found;
3831}

3833inline const std::array<std::array<Bitboard, 64>, 64> movegen::SQUARES_BETWEEN_BB = [] {
3834 attacks::initAttacks();
3835 return movegen::init_squares_between();
3836}();

3840#include <istream>

3842namespace chess::pgn {
3843
3847class Visitor {
3848 public:
3849 virtual ~Visitor() {};
3850
3857 void skipPgn(bool skip) { skip_ = skip; }
3858 bool skip() { return skip_; }
3859
3863 virtual void startPgn() = 0;
3864
3870 virtual void header(std::string_view key, std::string_view value) = 0;
3871
3875 virtual void startMoves() = 0;
3876
3882 virtual void move(std::string_view move, std::string_view comment) = 0;
3883
3887 virtual void endPgn() = 0;
3888
3889 private:
3890 bool skip_ = false;
3891};
3892
3893class StreamParserException : public std::exception {
3894 public:
3895 explicit StreamParserException(const char *message) : msg_(message) {}
3896
3897 explicit StreamParserException(const std::string &message) : msg_(message) {}
3898
3899 virtual ~StreamParserException() noexcept {}
3900
3901 virtual const char *what() const noexcept { return msg_.c_str(); }
3902
3903 protected:
3904 std::string msg_;
3905};
3906
3907template <std::size_t BUFFER_SIZE =
3908#if defined(__unix__) || defined(__unix) || defined(unix) || defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__MACH__)
3909# if defined(__APPLE__) || defined(__MACH__)
3910 256
3911# else
3912 1024
3913# endif
3914#else
3915 256
3916#endif
3917 >
3918class StreamParser {
3919 public:
3920 // Exception Class
3921
3922 StreamParser(std::istream &stream) : stream_buffer(stream) {}
3923
3924 void readGames(Visitor &vis) {
3925 visitor = &vis;
3926
3927 if (!stream_buffer.fill()) {
3928 return;
3929 }
3930
3931 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
3932 if (in_header) {
3933 visitor->skipPgn(false);
3934
3935 if (*c == '[') {
3936 visitor->startPgn();
3937 pgn_end = false;
3938
3939 processHeader();
3940 }
3941
3942 } else if (in_body) {
3943 processBody();
3944 }
3945
3946 if (!dont_advance_after_body) stream_buffer.advance();
3947 dont_advance_after_body = false;
3948 }
3949
3950 if (!pgn_end) {
3951 onEnd();
3952 }
3953 }
3954
3955 private:
3956 class LineBuffer {
3957 public:
3958 bool empty() const noexcept { return index_ == 0; }
3959
3960 void clear() noexcept { index_ = 0; }
3961
3962 std::string_view get() const noexcept { return std::string_view(buffer_.data(), index_); }
3963
3964 void operator+=(char c) {
3965 assert(index_ < N);
3966 buffer_[index_] = c;
3967 ++index_;
3968 }
3969
3970 void remove_suffix(std::size_t n) {
3971#ifndef CHESS_NO_EXCEPTIONS
3972 if (n > index_) {
3973 throw StreamParserException("LineBuffer underflow");
3974 }
3975#endif
3976
3977 index_ -= n;
3978 }
3979
3980 private:
3981 // PGN lines are limited to 255 characters
3982 static constexpr int N = 255;
3983 std::array<char, N> buffer_ = {};
3984 std::size_t index_ = 0;
3985 };
3986
3987 class StreamBuffer {
3988 private:
3989 static constexpr std::size_t N = BUFFER_SIZE;
3990 using BufferType = std::array<char, N * N>;
3991
3992 public:
3993 StreamBuffer(std::istream &stream) : stream_(stream) {}
3994
3995 // Get the current character, skip carriage returns
3996 std::optional<char> some() {
3997 if (buffer_index_ < bytes_read_) {
3998 const auto c = buffer_[buffer_index_];
3999
4000 if (c == '\r') {
4001 ++buffer_index_;
4002 return some();
4003 }
4004
4005 return c;
4006 } else {
4007 if (!fill()) {
4008 return std::nullopt;
4009 }
4010
4011 return some();
4012 }
4013 }
4014
4015 // Assume that the current character is already the opening_delim
4016 bool skipUntil(char open_delim, char close_delim) {
4017 int stack = 0;
4018
4019 while (true) {
4020 const auto ret = some();
4021 advance();
4022
4023 if (!ret.has_value()) {
4024 return false;
4025 }
4026
4027 if (*ret == open_delim) {
4028 ++stack;
4029 } else if (*ret == close_delim) {
4030 if (stack == 0) {
4031 // Mismatched closing delimiter
4032 return false;
4033 } else {
4034 --stack;
4035 if (stack == 0) {
4036 // Matching closing delimiter found
4037 return true;
4038 }
4039 }
4040 }
4041 }
4042
4043 // If we reach this point, there are unmatched opening delimiters
4044 return false;
4045 }
4046
4047 bool fill() {
4048 if (!stream_.good()) return false;
4049
4050 buffer_index_ = 0;
4051
4052 stream_.read(buffer_.data(), N * N);
4053 bytes_read_ = stream_.gcount();
4054
4055 return bytes_read_ > 0;
4056 }
4057
4058 void advance() {
4059 if (buffer_index_ >= bytes_read_) {
4060 fill();
4061 }
4062
4063 ++buffer_index_;
4064 }
4065
4066 char peek() {
4067 if (buffer_index_ + 1 >= bytes_read_) {
4068 return stream_.peek();
4069 }
4070
4071 return buffer_[buffer_index_ + 1];
4072 }
4073
4074 std::optional<char> current() {
4075 if (buffer_index_ >= bytes_read_) {
4076 return fill() ? std::optional<char>(buffer_[buffer_index_]) : std::nullopt;
4077 }
4078
4079 return buffer_[buffer_index_];
4080 }
4081
4082 private:
4083 std::istream &stream_;
4084 BufferType buffer_;
4085 std::streamsize bytes_read_ = 0;
4086 std::streamsize buffer_index_ = 0;
4087 };
4088
4089 void reset_trackers() {
4090 header.first.clear();
4091 header.second.clear();
4092
4093 move.clear();
4094 comment.clear();
4095
4096 in_header = true;
4097 in_body = false;
4098 }
4099
4100 void callVisitorMoveFunction() {
4101 if (!move.empty()) {
4102 if (!visitor->skip()) visitor->move(move.get(), comment.get());
4103
4104 move.clear();
4105 comment.clear();
4106 }
4107 }
4108
4109 void processHeader() {
4110 bool backslash = false;
4111
4112 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4113 switch (*c) {
4114 // tag start
4115 case '[':
4116 stream_buffer.advance();
4117
4118 while (auto k = stream_buffer.some()) {
4119 if (is_space(*k)) {
4120 break;
4121 } else {
4122 header.first += *k;
4123 stream_buffer.advance();
4124 }
4125 }
4126
4127 stream_buffer.advance();
4128 break;
4129 case '"':
4130 stream_buffer.advance();
4131
4132 while (auto k = stream_buffer.some()) {
4133 if (*k == '\\') {
4134 backslash = true;
4135 // don't add backslash to header, is this really correct?
4136 stream_buffer.advance();
4137 } else if (*k == '"' && !backslash) {
4138 stream_buffer.advance();
4139
4140 // we should be now at ]
4141 assert(stream_buffer.current().value() == ']');
4142 stream_buffer.advance();
4143
4144 break;
4145 }
4146#ifndef CHESS_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4147 else if (*k == '\n') {
4148 // we missed the closing quote and read until the newline character
4149 // this is an invalid pgn, let's throw an error
4150 throw StreamParserException("Invalid PGN, missing closing quote in header");
4151 }
4152#endif
4153 else {
4154 backslash = false;
4155 header.second += *k;
4156 stream_buffer.advance();
4157 }
4158 }
4159
4160 // manually skip carriage return, otherwise we would be in the body
4161 // ideally we should completely skip all carriage returns and newlines to avoid this
4162 if (stream_buffer.current() == '\r') {
4163 stream_buffer.advance();
4164 }
4165
4166 if (!visitor->skip()) visitor->header(header.first.get(), header.second.get());
4167
4168 header.first.clear();
4169 header.second.clear();
4170
4171 stream_buffer.advance();
4172 break;
4173 case '\n':
4174 in_header = false;
4175 in_body = true;
4176
4177 if (!visitor->skip()) visitor->startMoves();
4178
4179 goto exit_loop;
4180 default:
4181 // this should normally not happen
4182 // lets just go into the body, will this always be save?
4183 in_header = false;
4184 in_body = true;
4185
4186 if (!visitor->skip()) visitor->startMoves();
4187
4188 goto exit_loop;
4189 }
4190 }
4191
4192 exit_loop:;
4193 }
4194
4195 void processBody() {
4196 auto is_termination_symbol = false;
4197 auto has_comment = false;
4198
4199 start:
4200 /*
4201 Skip first move number or game termination
4202 Also skip - * / to fix games
4203 which directly start with a game termination
4204 this https://github.com/Disservin/chess-library/issues/68
4205 */
4206
4207 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4208 if (*c == ' ' || is_digit(*c)) {
4209 stream_buffer.advance();
4210 } else if (*c == '-' || *c == '*' || c == '/') {
4211 is_termination_symbol = true;
4212 stream_buffer.advance();
4213 } else if (*c == '{') {
4214 has_comment = true;
4215
4216 // reading comment
4217 stream_buffer.advance();
4218
4219 while (auto k = stream_buffer.some()) {
4220 stream_buffer.advance();
4221
4222 if (*k == '}') {
4223 break;
4224 }
4225
4226 comment += *k;
4227 }
4228
4229 // the game has no moves, but a comment followed by a game termination
4230 if (!visitor->skip()) {
4231 visitor->move("", comment.get());
4232
4233 comment.clear();
4234 }
4235 } else {
4236 break;
4237 }
4238 }
4239
4240 // we need to reparse the termination symbol
4241 if (has_comment && !is_termination_symbol) {
4242 goto start;
4243 }
4244
4245 // game had no moves, so we can skip it and call endPgn
4246 if (is_termination_symbol) {
4247 onEnd();
4248 return;
4249 }
4250
4251 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4252 if (is_space(*c)) {
4253 stream_buffer.advance();
4254 continue;
4255 }
4256
4257 break;
4258 }
4259
4260 while (auto cd = stream_buffer.some()) {
4261 // Pgn are build up in the following way.
4262 // {move_number} {move} {comment} {move} {comment} {move_number} ...
4263 // So we need to skip the move_number then start reading the move, then save the comment
4264 // then read the second move in the group. After that a move_number will follow again.
4265
4266 // [ is unexpected here, it probably is a new pgn and the current one is finished
4267 if (*cd == '[') {
4268 onEnd();
4269 dont_advance_after_body = true;
4270 // break;
4271 break;
4272 }
4273
4274 // skip move number digits
4275 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4276 if (is_space(*c) || is_digit(*c)) {
4277 stream_buffer.advance();
4278 } else {
4279 break;
4280 }
4281 }
4282
4283 // skip dots
4284 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4285 if (*c == '.') {
4286 stream_buffer.advance();
4287 } else {
4288 break;
4289 }
4290 }
4291
4292 // skip spaces
4293 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4294 if (is_space(*c)) {
4295 stream_buffer.advance();
4296 } else {
4297 break;
4298 }
4299 }
4300
4301 // parse move
4302 if (parseMove()) {
4303 break;
4304 }
4305
4306 // skip spaces
4307 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4308 if (is_space(*c)) {
4309 stream_buffer.advance();
4310 } else {
4311 break;
4312 }
4313 }
4314
4315 // game termination
4316 auto curr = stream_buffer.current();
4317
4318 if (!curr.has_value()) {
4319 onEnd();
4320 break;
4321 }
4322
4323 // game termination
4324 if (*curr == '*') {
4325 onEnd();
4326 stream_buffer.advance();
4327
4328 break;
4329 }
4330
4331 const auto peek = stream_buffer.peek();
4332
4333 if (*curr == '1') {
4334 if (peek == '-') {
4335 stream_buffer.advance();
4336 stream_buffer.advance();
4337
4338 onEnd();
4339 break;
4340 } else if (peek == '/') {
4341 for (size_t i = 0; i <= 6; ++i) {
4342 stream_buffer.advance();
4343 }
4344
4345 onEnd();
4346 break;
4347 }
4348 }
4349
4350 // might be 0-1 (game termination) or 0-0-0/0-0 (castling)
4351 if (*curr == '0' && stream_buffer.peek() == '-') {
4352 stream_buffer.advance();
4353 stream_buffer.advance();
4354
4355 const auto c = stream_buffer.current();
4356 if (!c.has_value()) {
4357 onEnd();
4358
4359 break;
4360 }
4361
4362 // game termination
4363 if (*c == '1') {
4364 onEnd();
4365 stream_buffer.advance();
4366
4367 break;
4368 }
4369 // castling
4370 else {
4371 move += '0';
4372 move += '-';
4373
4374 if (parseMove()) {
4375 stream_buffer.advance();
4376 break;
4377 }
4378 }
4379 }
4380 }
4381 }
4382
4383 bool parseMove() {
4384 // reading move
4385 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4386 if (is_space(*c)) {
4387 break;
4388 }
4389
4390 move += *c;
4391
4392 stream_buffer.advance();
4393 }
4394
4395 return parseMoveAppendix();
4396 }
4397
4398 bool parseMoveAppendix() {
4399 while (true) {
4400 auto curr = stream_buffer.current();
4401
4402 if (!curr.has_value()) {
4403 onEnd();
4404 return true;
4405 }
4406
4407 switch (*curr) {
4408 case '{': {
4409 // reading comment
4410 stream_buffer.advance();
4411
4412 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4413 stream_buffer.advance();
4414
4415 if (*c == '}') {
4416 break;
4417 }
4418
4419 comment += *c;
4420 }
4421
4422 break;
4423 }
4424 case '(': {
4425 stream_buffer.skipUntil('(', ')');
4426 break;
4427 }
4428 case '$': {
4429 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4430 if (is_space(*c)) {
4431 break;
4432 }
4433
4434 stream_buffer.advance();
4435 }
4436
4437 break;
4438 }
4439 case ' ': {
4440 while (auto c = stream_buffer.some()) {
4441 if (!is_space(*c)) {
4442 break;
4443 }
4444
4445 stream_buffer.advance();
4446 }
4447
4448 break;
4449 }
4450 default:
4451 callVisitorMoveFunction();
4452 return false;
4453 }
4454 }
4455 }
4456
4457 void onEnd() {
4458 callVisitorMoveFunction();
4459 visitor->endPgn();
4460 visitor->skipPgn(false);
4461
4462 reset_trackers();
4463
4464 pgn_end = true;
4465 }
4466
4467 bool is_space(const char c) noexcept {
4468 switch (c) {
4469 case ' ':
4470 case '\t':
4471 case '\n':
4472 case '\r':
4473 return true;
4474 default:
4475 return false;
4476 }
4477 }
4478
4479 bool is_digit(const char c) noexcept {
4480 switch (c) {
4481 case '0':
4482 case '1':
4483 case '2':
4484 case '3':
4485 case '4':
4486 case '5':
4487 case '6':
4488 case '7':
4489 case '8':
4490 case '9':
4491 return true;
4492 default:
4493 return false;
4494 }
4495 }
4496
4497 StreamBuffer stream_buffer;
4498
4499 Visitor *visitor = nullptr;
4500
4501 // one time allocations
4502 std::pair<LineBuffer, LineBuffer> header = {LineBuffer{}, LineBuffer{}};
4503
4504 LineBuffer move = {};
4505 LineBuffer comment = {};
4506
4507 // State
4508
4509 bool in_header = true;
4510 bool in_body = false;
4511
4512 bool pgn_end = true;
4513
4514 bool dont_advance_after_body = false;
4515};
4516} // namespace chess::pgn
4517
4518#include <sstream>
4519
4520
4521namespace chess {
4522class uci {
4523 public:
4530 [[nodiscard]] static std::string moveToUci(const Move &move, bool chess960 = false) noexcept(false) {
4531 // Get the from and to squares
4532 Square from_sq = move.from();
4533 Square to_sq = move.to();
4534
4535 // If the move is not a chess960 castling move and is a king moving more than one square,
4536 // update the to square to be the correct square for a regular castling move
4537 if (!chess960 && move.typeOf() == Move::CASTLING) {
4538 to_sq = Square(to_sq > from_sq ? File::FILE_G : File::FILE_C, from_sq.rank());
4539 }
4540
4541 std::stringstream ss;
4542
4543 // Add the from and to squares to the string stream
4544 ss << from_sq;
4545 ss << to_sq;
4546
4547 // If the move is a promotion, add the promoted piece to the string stream
4548 if (move.typeOf() == Move::PROMOTION) {
4549 ss << static_cast<std::string>(move.promotionType());
4550 }
4551
4552 return ss.str();
4553 }
4554
4561 [[nodiscard]] static Move uciToMove(const Board &board, const std::string &uci) noexcept(false) {
4562 if (uci.length() < 4) {
4563 return Move::NO_MOVE;
4564 }
4565
4566 Square source = Square(uci.substr(0, 2));
4567 Square target = Square(uci.substr(2, 2));
4568
4569 if (!source.is_valid() || !target.is_valid()) {
4570 return Move::NO_MOVE;
4571 }
4572
4573 PieceType piece = board.at(source).type();
4574
4575 // castling in chess960
4576 if (board.chess960() && piece == PieceType::KING && board.at(target).type() == PieceType::ROOK &&
4577 board.at(target).color() == board.sideToMove()) {
4578 return Move::make<Move::CASTLING>(source, target);
4579 }
4580
4581 // convert to king captures rook
4582 // in chess960 the move should be sent as king captures rook already!
4583 if (!board.chess960() && piece == PieceType::KING && Square::distance(target, source) == 2) {
4584 target = Square(target > source ? File::FILE_H : File::FILE_A, source.rank());
4585 return Move::make<Move::CASTLING>(source, target);
4586 }
4587
4588 // en passant
4589 if (piece == PieceType::PAWN && target == board.enpassantSq()) {
4590 return Move::make<Move::ENPASSANT>(source, target);
4591 }
4592
4593 // promotion
4594 if (piece == PieceType::PAWN && uci.length() == 5 && Square::back_rank(target, ~board.sideToMove())) {
4595 auto promotion = PieceType(uci.substr(4, 1));
4596
4597 if (promotion != PieceType::QUEEN && promotion != PieceType::ROOK && promotion != PieceType::BISHOP &&
4598 promotion != PieceType::KNIGHT) {
4599 return Move::NO_MOVE;
4600 }
4601
4602 return Move::make<Move::PROMOTION>(source, target, PieceType(uci.substr(4, 1)));
4603 }
4604
4605 switch (uci.length()) {
4606 case 4:
4607 return Move::make<Move::NORMAL>(source, target);
4608 default:
4609 return Move::NO_MOVE;
4610 }
4611 }

4621 moveToRep<false>(board, move, san);

4623 }

4631 [[nodiscard]] static std::string moveToLan(const Board &board, const Move &move) noexcept(false) {
4632 std::string lan;
4633 moveToRep<true>(board, move, lan);
4634 return lan;

4637 class SanParseError : public std::exception {
4638 public:
4639 explicit SanParseError(const char *message) : msg_(message) {}
4640
4641 explicit SanParseError(const std::string &message) : msg_(message) {}
4642
4643 virtual ~SanParseError() noexcept {}
4644
4645 virtual const char *what() const noexcept { return msg_.c_str(); }
4646
4647 protected:
4648 std::string msg_;
4649 };
4650
4651 class AmbiguousMoveError : public std::exception {
4652 public:
4653 explicit AmbiguousMoveError(const char *message) : msg_(message) {}
4654
4655 explicit AmbiguousMoveError(const std::string &message) : msg_(message) {}
4656
4657 virtual ~AmbiguousMoveError() noexcept {}
4658
4659 virtual const char *what() const noexcept { return msg_.c_str(); }
4660
4661 protected:
4662 std::string msg_;
4663 };
4664
4672 template <bool PEDANTIC = false>
4673 [[nodiscard]] static Move parseSan(const Board &board, std::string_view san) noexcept(false) {
4674 Movelist moves;
4675
4676 return parseSan<PEDANTIC>(board, san, moves);
4677 }
4678
4679 template <bool PEDANTIC = false>
4680 [[nodiscard]] static Move parseSan(const Board &board, std::string_view san, Movelist &moves) noexcept(false) {
4681 if (san.empty()) {
4682 return Move::NO_MOVE;
4683 }
4684
4685 static constexpr auto pt_to_pgt = [](PieceType pt) { return 1 << (pt); };
4686 const SanMoveInformation info = parseSanInfo<PEDANTIC>(san);
4687
4688 if (info.capture) {
4689 movegen::legalmoves<movegen::MoveGenType::CAPTURE>(moves, board, pt_to_pgt(info.piece));
4690 } else {
4691 movegen::legalmoves<movegen::MoveGenType::QUIET>(moves, board, pt_to_pgt(info.piece));
4692 }
4693
4694 if (info.castling_short || info.castling_long) {
4695 for (const auto &move : moves) {
4696 if (move.typeOf() == Move::CASTLING) {
4697 if ((info.castling_short && move.to() > move.from()) ||
4698 (info.castling_long && move.to() < move.from())) {
4699 return move;
4700 }
4701 }
4702 }
4703
4704#ifndef CHESS_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4705 throw SanParseError("Failed to parse san. At step 2: " + std::string(san) + " " + board.getFen());
4706#endif
4707 }
4708
4709 Move matchingMove = Move::NO_MOVE;
4710 bool foundMatch = false;
4711
4712 for (const auto &move : moves) {
4713 // Skip all moves that are not to the correct square
4714 // or are castling moves
4715 if (move.to() != info.to || move.typeOf() == Move::CASTLING) {
4716 continue;
4717 }
4718
4719 // Handle promotion moves
4720 if (info.promotion != PieceType::NONE) {
4721 if (move.typeOf() != Move::PROMOTION || info.promotion != move.promotionType() ||
4722 move.from().file() != info.from_file) {
4723 continue;
4724 }
4725 }
4726 // Handle en passant moves
4727 else if (move.typeOf() == Move::ENPASSANT) {
4728 if (move.from().file() != info.from_file) {
4729 continue;
4730 }
4731 }
4732 // Handle moves with specific from square
4733 else if (info.from != Square::underlying::NO_SQ) {
4734 if (move.from() != info.from) {
4735 continue;
4736 }
4737 }
4738 // Handle moves with partial from information (rank or file)
4739 else if (info.from_rank != Rank::NO_RANK || info.from_file != File::NO_FILE) {
4740 if ((info.from_file != File::NO_FILE && move.from().file() != info.from_file) ||
4741 (info.from_rank != Rank::NO_RANK && move.from().rank() != info.from_rank)) {
4742 continue;
4743 }
4744 }
4745
4746 // If we get here, the move matches our criteria
4747 if (foundMatch) {
4748#ifndef CHESS_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4749 throw AmbiguousMoveError("Ambiguous san: " + std::string(san) + " in " + board.getFen());
4750#endif
4751 }
4752
4753 matchingMove = move;
4754 foundMatch = true;
4755 }
4756
4757 if (!foundMatch) {
4758#ifndef CHESS_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4759 throw SanParseError("Failed to parse san. At step 3: " + std::string(san) + " " + board.getFen());
4760#endif
4761 }
4762
4763 return matchingMove;
4764 }
4765
4766 private:
4767 struct SanMoveInformation {
4768 File from_file = File::NO_FILE;
4769 Rank from_rank = Rank::NO_RANK;
4770
4771 PieceType promotion = PieceType::NONE;
4772
4773 Square from = Square::underlying::NO_SQ;
4774 Square to = Square::underlying::NO_SQ; // a valid move always has a to square
4775
4776 PieceType piece = PieceType::NONE; // a valid move always has a piece
4777
4778 bool castling_short = false;
4779 bool castling_long = false;
4780
4781 bool capture = false;
4782 };
4783
4784 template <bool PEDANTIC = false>
4785 [[nodiscard]] static SanMoveInformation parseSanInfo(std::string_view san) noexcept(false) {
4786#ifndef CHESS_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4787 if constexpr (PEDANTIC) {
4788 if (san.length() < 2) {
4789 throw SanParseError("Failed to parse san. At step 0: " + std::string(san));
4790 }
4791 }
4792#endif
4793 constexpr auto parse_castle = [](std::string_view &san, SanMoveInformation &info, char castling_char) {
4794 info.piece = PieceType::KING;
4795
4796 san.remove_prefix(3);
4797
4798 info.castling_short = san.length() == 0 || (san.length() >= 1 && san[0] != '-');
4799 info.castling_long = san.length() >= 2 && san[0] == '-' && san[1] == castling_char;
4800
4801 assert((info.castling_short && !info.castling_long) || (!info.castling_short && info.castling_long) ||
4802 (!info.castling_short && !info.castling_long));
4803 };
4804
4805 static constexpr auto isRank = [](char c) { return c >= '1' && c <= '8'; };
4806 static constexpr auto isFile = [](char c) { return c >= 'a' && c <= 'h'; };
4807 static constexpr auto sw = [](const char &c) { return std::string_view(&c, 1); };
4808
4809 SanMoveInformation info;
4810
4811 // set to 1 to skip piece type offset
4812 std::size_t index = 1;
4813
4814 if (san[0] == 'O' || san[0] == '0') {
4815 parse_castle(san, info, san[0]);
4816 return info;
4817 } else if (isFile(san[0])) {
4818 index--;
4819 info.piece = PieceType::PAWN;
4820 } else {
4821 info.piece = PieceType(san);
4822 }
4823
4824 File file_to = File::NO_FILE;
4825 Rank rank_to = Rank::NO_RANK;
4826
4827 // check if san starts with a file, if so it will be start file
4828 if (index < san.size() && isFile(san[index])) {
4829 info.from_file = File(sw(san[index]));
4830 index++;
4831 }
4832
4833 // check if san starts with a rank, if so it will be start rank
4834 if (index < san.size() && isRank(san[index])) {
4835 info.from_rank = Rank(sw(san[index]));
4836 index++;
4837 }
4838
4839 // skip capture sign
4840 if (index < san.size() && san[index] == 'x') {
4841 info.capture = true;
4842 index++;
4843 }
4844
4845 // to file
4846 if (index < san.size() && isFile(san[index])) {
4847 file_to = File(sw(san[index]));
4848 index++;
4849 }
4850
4851 // to rank
4852 if (index < san.size() && isRank(san[index])) {
4853 rank_to = Rank(sw(san[index]));
4854 index++;
4855 }
4856
4857 // promotion
4858 if (index < san.size() && san[index] == '=') {
4859 index++;
4860 info.promotion = PieceType(sw(san[index]));
4861
4862#ifndef CHESS_NO_EXCEPTIONS
4863 if (info.promotion == PieceType::KING || info.promotion == PieceType::PAWN ||
4864 info.promotion == PieceType::NONE)
4865 throw SanParseError("Failed to parse promotion, during san conversion." + std::string(san));
4866#endif
4867
4868 index++;
4869 }
4870
4871 // for simple moves like Nf3, e4, etc. all the information is contained
4872 // in the from file and rank. Thus we need to move it to the to file and rank.
4873 if (file_to == File::NO_FILE && rank_to == Rank::NO_RANK) {
4874 file_to = info.from_file;
4875 rank_to = info.from_rank;
4876
4877 info.from_file = File::NO_FILE;
4878 info.from_rank = Rank::NO_RANK;
4879 }
4880
4881 // pawns which are not capturing stay on the same file
4882 if (info.piece == PieceType::PAWN && info.from_file == File::NO_FILE && !info.capture) {
4883 info.from_file = file_to;
4884 }
4885
4886 info.to = Square(file_to, rank_to);
4887
4888 if (info.from_file != File::NO_FILE && info.from_rank != Rank::NO_RANK) {
4889 info.from = Square(info.from_file, info.from_rank);
4890 }
4891
4892 return info;
4893 }
4894
4895 template <bool LAN = false>
4896 static void moveToRep(Board board, const Move &move, std::string &str) {
4897 if (handleCastling(move, str)) {
4898 return;
4899 }
4900
4901 const PieceType pt = board.at(move.from()).type();
4902 const bool isCapture = board.at(move.to()) != Piece::NONE || move.typeOf() == Move::ENPASSANT;
4903
4904 assert(pt != PieceType::NONE);
4905
4906 if (pt != PieceType::PAWN) {
4907 appendPieceSymbol(pt, str);
4908 }
4909
4910 if constexpr (LAN) {
4911 appendSquare(move.from(), str);
4912 } else {
4913 if (pt == PieceType::PAWN) {
4914 str += isCapture ? static_cast<std::string>(move.from().file()) : "";
4915 } else {
4916 resolveAmbiguity(board, move, pt, str);
4917 }
4918 }
4919
4920 if (isCapture) {
4921 str += 'x';
4922 }
4923
4924 appendSquare(move.to(), str);
4925
4926 if (move.typeOf() == Move::PROMOTION) appendPromotion(move, str);
4927
4928 board.makeMove(move);
4929
4930 if (board.inCheck()) appendCheckSymbol(board, str);
4931 }
4932
4933 static bool handleCastling(const Move &move, std::string &str) {
4934 if (move.typeOf() != Move::CASTLING) return false;
4935
4936 str = (move.to().file() > move.from().file()) ? "O-O" : "O-O-O";
4937 return true;
4938 }
4939
4940 static void appendPieceSymbol(PieceType pieceType, std::string &str) {
4941 str += std::toupper(static_cast<std::string>(pieceType)[0]);
4942 }
4943
4944 static void appendSquare(Square square, std::string &str) {
4945 str += static_cast<std::string>(square.file());
4946 str += static_cast<std::string>(square.rank());
4947 }
4948
4949 static void appendPromotion(const Move &move, std::string &str) {
4950 str += '=';
4951 str += std::toupper(static_cast<std::string>(move.promotionType())[0]);
4952 }
4953
4954 static void appendCheckSymbol(Board &board, std::string &str) {
4955 const auto gameState = board.isGameOver().second;
4956 str += (gameState == GameResult::LOSE) ? '#' : '+';
4957 }
4958
4959 static void resolveAmbiguity(const Board &board, const Move &move, PieceType pieceType, std::string &str) {
4960 Movelist moves;
4961 movegen::legalmoves(moves, board, 1 << pieceType);
4962
4963 bool needFile = false;
4964 bool needRank = false;
4965 bool hasAmbiguousMove = false;
4966
4967 for (const auto &m : moves) {
4968 if (m != move && m.to() == move.to()) {
4969 hasAmbiguousMove = true;
4970
4971 /*
4972 First, if the moving pieces can be distinguished by their originating files, the originating
4973 file letter of the moving piece is inserted immediately after the moving piece letter.
4974
4975 Second (when the first step fails), if the moving pieces can be distinguished by their
4976 originating ranks, the originating rank digit of the moving piece is inserted immediately after
4977 the moving piece letter.
4978
4979 Third (when both the first and the second steps fail), the two character square coordinate of
4980 the originating square of the moving piece is inserted immediately after the moving piece
4981 letter.
4982 */
4983
4984 if (isIdentifiableByType(moves, move, move.from().file())) {
4985 needFile = true;
4986 break;
4987 }
4988
4989 if (isIdentifiableByType(moves, move, move.from().rank())) {
4990 needRank = true;
4991 break;
4992 }
4993 }
4994 }
4995
4996 if (needFile) str += static_cast<std::string>(move.from().file());
4997 if (needRank) str += static_cast<std::string>(move.from().rank());
4998
4999 // we weren't able to disambiguate the move by either file or rank, so we need to use both
5000 if (hasAmbiguousMove && !needFile && !needRank) {
5001 appendSquare(move.from(), str);
5002 }
5003 }
5004
5005 template <typename CoordinateType>
5006 static bool isIdentifiableByType(const Movelist &moves, const Move move, CoordinateType type) {
5007 static_assert(std::is_same_v<CoordinateType, File> || std::is_same_v<CoordinateType, Rank>,
5008 "CoordinateType must be either File or Rank");
5009
5010 for (const auto &m : moves) {
5011 if (m == move || m.to() != move.to()) {
5012 continue;
5013 }
5014
5015 // file
5016 if constexpr (std::is_same_v<CoordinateType, File>) {
5017 if (type == m.from().file()) return false;
5018 }
5019 // rank
5020 else {
5021 if (type == m.from().rank()) return false;
5022 }
5023 }
5024
5025 return true;
5026 }
5027};
5028} // namespace chess
5029
5030#endif
